directions: In a large mixing bowl, combine the yogurt with the paprika, cumin, cinnamon and chipotle. Add the chicken, apricots, almonds, celery and green onion and mix. Finish with lots of cracked black pepper and sea salt to taste.
Spread this on a sandwich or in a tortilla, or mix it up with some arugula or romaine lettuce.
ingredients: lots of sea salt + freshly cracked black pepper
Whole wheat tortillas or sliced bread; can also be served on a bed of greens
title: MOROCCAN CHICKEN + APRICOT SALAD
